title: LITERATURE SURVEY
content: A comprehensive review of existing literature to understand the background and context of the research domain.

title: RESEARCH PROBLEM
content: Identification of the specific problem that the research aims to address.

title: RESEARCH GAP
content: Highlighting the gaps in existing knowledge or areas that require further investigation.

title: RESEARCH OBJECTIVE
content: Defining the primary goals and objectives of the research.

title: METHODOLOGY
content: Details about the research methods and approaches to be utilized.

title: TECHNOLOGIES
content: An overview of the technologies and tools that will be used in the research.
